```{r}
library(qualityTools)
Xbar <- vector()
n <- 50
mu <- 0.5
stSD <- 0.5/sqrt(n)
rate <- 2

for (i in 1:100) {
  randX <- rexp(n, rate)
  Xbar <- append(Xbar, mean(randX))
}

# Theoretical mean and sd is 0.5
# Theoritical variance os 0.25

obsMean <- mean(Xbar)
obsVar <- var(Xbar)*n
ratioMu <- obsMean/mu
ratioVar <- obsVar/0.25

print("The ratio of observed mean of Xbar to theoritical mean is : ")
print(ratioMu)
print("The ratio of observed variance of Xbar to theoritical variance is : ")
print(ratioVar)



standardizedXbar <- vector()
for (i in 1:100) {
  stX <- (Xbar[i] - mu) / stSD
  standardizedXbar <- append(standardizedXbar, stX)
}
hist(standardizedXbar, breaks = 25)
qqPlot(standardizedXbar)


```
